body: Find out [how to make a money claim](https://www.gov.uk/make-money-claim), including whether you're eligible.

components.html: Before making a claim, contact the person or organisation to try to [resolve the issue by discussion or mediation](https://civilmediation.org/for-the-public/about-mediation/).

heading: How to make a money claim
lede: You can make a money claim if you think a person or organisation owes you money and will not pay you back. Youâ€™ll have to [pay a fee](https://www.gov.uk/make-court-claim-for-money/court-fees).
